website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and economical to run, this is a versatile option that can be used for both tanks and small ponds.
pros: Works for up to 300-gallon ponds or tanks
Can be used floating or submerged
cons: Electrical cord is on the short side

customer_reviews.title: My ducks are happy, so I’m happy.
customer_reviews.text: 300 gallon vinyl pool, temps 25-45 over the past couple of weeks. This de-icer is doing a great job the three weeks I’ve had it. Happy with this purchase/product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Brandes

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: This company stock tank heaters work out of the box about 90% of the time otherwise they don't work at all. You need to buy a new one each year, they are not designed to last but rather to fail. This latest one I got in October and now in December just when the ice started to build up it isn't working and there is no way to return and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Quick test out of the box, and I felt heat. Only plugged in for about 30 seconds. We'll see how it goes throughout the winter, but I have lots of farm experience with stock tank heaters, and this seems like a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job thawing out my rubbermaid tank. I take it out during the day because one of the horses is bothered by it and won't drink out of the tank with it in there. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: mamamia

customer_reviews.title: I used it for my fish pond. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my fish pond. It was a bit hard to get to float due to the cord being so stiff underneath. It kept my Northern Ohio pool ice free right around unit (unlike the sunken types I had used before that kept the whole pool ice free BUT caught all the muck on its elements) which was my main purpose for giving birds and critters winter water.
customer_reviews.author: shotgun

customer_reviews.title: No ice low electric
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after a different brand I bought rusted and broke apart; this one is holding up well and I have never had any icing over in the horse waterers even left outside in Massachusetts winters
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this heater before locally but Every one has been sold out. The delivery was quick which was the important part for me. The heater itself always works well I only have to replace it periodically because I have a horse that smashes it with repeated blows from his foot. Easier to replace the heater than the horse :/ but hey anyone want a horse that loves to splash?
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Purchase of this Brand/Type of Water Heater
customer_reviews.text: Have used this type of outside water heater for my horses' water tank previously. Works great even in our weather in Midwest. Love the fact that you can have it floating or submerged. (Better submerged for horses, who like to play in their water tank, no matter what time of the year!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a happy camper.
customer_reviews.text: This ice melter/water warmer is in my fish pond now at temperatures at 0 every day and it has worked well. No problem at all. First one I've had that has worked so well. I am a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Le R. Self

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for plastic duck pond!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in a timely manner and has worked as described. I am using it in a 4’ x 4’ plastic swimming pool that I am using for a duck pond. It keeps the water from freezing so the ducks can use it throughout the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Dog water
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large water container 25 gal and it did not freeze with several nights below O this works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: DFitz

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality tank heater!!
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials, strong... Wish the cord was longer, as cows kept pulling it out of tank, even though tied to fence...
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have used drain hole heaters and when they fail it is hard to replace them in the snow and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Not great for a fish pond made of plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the item because it could not be plugged into an extension cord and was not designed for plastic pools.
customer_reviews.author: James Mactavish

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love love tank deicer. Very well made easy to install. Deicer will float or sink to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: colleen owens-hansen

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome!! Haven’t had long enough to rate on longevity. But is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: mariavan0205

customer_reviews.title: Keeps our donkeys happy!
customer_reviews.text: We don't live on our land and when the ice comes it can be impossible to check on the water trough. We purchased this so we were certain that water stayed available. It does not melt a plastic tank. We take it out when the weather is nicer in order to extend the life.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Stock tank de-icer
customer_reviews.text: Great for de-icing stock tanks. It’s in our 100 gallon tank, definitely doing it’s job. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DiAnna Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Goats water supply
customer_reviews.text: Freezing water problem solved! Added this to my level controlled water trouph which is fed from a 55 gal drum. Goats now have a 24/7 water supply!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald G.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water from freezing, even under extreme temps. However, the coils around the power cable rust under water.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps water from freezing, even under extreme temps. However, the coils around the power cable rust under water.
customer_reviews.author: LYNNE E.

customer_reviews.title: Defective, must have been a lemon
customer_reviews.text: This item didn’t work from when it was first plugged in. I returned it and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the coiled de-icers for horse water troughs and they were ok until they melted. These are much better!! have been using for a couple months and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last two months and now outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: quit working shortly after I started using it. Would not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: HORSEPOOR.WILSON

customer_reviews.title: It shocks
customer_reviews.text: So water gets in there and shorts out. Was shocking the horses. No good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: This heater did not work upon coming out of the box. Had the hassle of having to return it and immediately go to a store to find another heater to prevent our pond from freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This de-icer Farm Innovator 2-in -1
customer_reviews.text: This deicer I highly recommend, with our very cold winter this year our septic froze for the barn. We put this De-icer in and it was melted in a matter of a few days. I will keep one of these on hand and use it every winter from now on Sally
customer_reviews.author: Sally Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Tank de-icer
customer_reviews.text: This de-icer is fantastic. It can't sit on the bottom of the tank. If the water level drops too low, it shuts itself off. Small, easy to use and the animals like the not ice cold water.
customer_reviews.author: J. Staskal

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly. It is exactly as described and is working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: doomsage 13

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased these one a year for my two ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these one a year for my two horses. This year the one I purchased last spring has completely cracked and no longer floats. My horses don't mess with it and it's been a mild winter tempature wise - there's no reason it should be cracking.
customer_reviews.author: fyyfx

product_meta.title: Farm Innovators Model H-418C 2-In-1 Cast Aluminum Convert-Able Plastic Tank De-Icer, 1,250-Watt
product_meta.description: This item is a Farm Innovators 2-in-1 cast aluminum convert-able plastic tank de-icer model h-418c, 1, 250-watt. Purpose of use for snow removal, snow & ice melt. This product is Manufactured in the United States.
feature_bullets: This item is a Farm Innovators 2-In-1 Cast Aluminum Convert-Able Plastic Tank De-icer Model H-418C, 1,250-Watt
Purpose of use for Snow Removal, Snow & Ice Melt
This product is manufactured in United States
Converts from a floating de-icer into a submergible de-icer with the simple removal of the float
Thermostatically controlled to operate only when necessary

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
